rare.name: ENHANCED TARGET SENSORS
rare.description: Deal 25% more damage to enemies farther than 12m away.

rare.name: ARCFINDER
rare.description: [Energy Javelin] deals 25% increased damage to enemies farther than 12m away.

rare.name: REFRACTION TILES
rare.description: While [Javelin Spin] is active, gain 50% damage reduction from beams.

epic.name: 3D-PRINTED LANCE
epic.description: [Energy Javelin] cooldown is reduced by 15%, but each use generates 25 [Heat].

epic.name: OLADELE-COPTER BLADES
epic.description: While using [Javelin Spin], gain free flight and 20% Move Speed.

rare.name: CHARGED CHASSIS
rare.description: [Fortify] grants additional Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life.

rare.name: SIPHONIC SPEAR
rare.description: When you deal damage with [Energy Javelin], heal 10% of your max Life over 3s.

rare.name: SOLAR REGENERGY
rare.description: After using an ability, restore Armor equal to 5% of your max Life.

epic.name: HOLLAGRAM HELMET
epic.description: When you use [Fortify], allies within line of sight gain Unstoppable for 2s.

powers.title: SCORCHED EARTH
powers.description: When you [Overheat], apply Burning to enemies within 6m, dealing damage equal to 10% of your max Life over 5s.

powers.title: SHIELD DIVERGENCE
powers.description: When you [Overheat], deploy a Barrier with 600 Health in front.

powers.title: ADVANCED THROWBOTICS
powers.description: When you use [Javelin Spin], launch an [Energy Javelin] with 50% less damage.

powers.title: HOT ROTATE-O
powers.description: [Javelin Spin] gains 35% Cooldown Reduction but now generates [Heat].

powers.title: SPYNSTEM UPDATE
powers.description: [Javelin Spin] now deflects projectiles and grants 20% of damage dealt from deflecting as Ultimate Charge.

powers.title: FACTORY RESET
powers.description: While [Fortify] is active, [Javelin Spin] and [Energy Javelin] gain 25% Cooldown Reduction.

powers.title: HOOVES OF STEEL
powers.description:
After [Fortify] ends, gain Shields equal to 50% of the damage received during [Fortify].
Resets when you next use [Fortify].

powers.title: RESTORTIFY
powers.description: While [Fortify] is active, heal for 10% of your max Life every 1s.

powers.title: RIDE WITH ME
powers.description: While [Fortify] is active, grant allies in line of sight 30% Move Speed and Overhealth equal to 10% of your max Life.

powers.title: LASSOED
powers.description: On impact, [Energy Javelin] will pull enemies within 4m towards itself.

powers.title: CENTRIPETAL CHARGE
powers.description:
25% Ultimate Cost Reduction.
After using [Terra Surge], reset your ability cooldowns.

powers.title: SUPERCHARGER
powers.description: When you use [Terra Surge], drop a [Supercharger] that increases the damage of nearby allies by 25% for 15s.
